protein.general_function: Involved in G-protein coupled receptor protein signaling pathway
protein.specific_function: Beta-adrenergic receptors mediate the catecholamine- induced activation of adenylate cyclase through the action of G proteins. This receptor binds epinephrine and norepinephrine with approximately equal affinity

go_class.description: cell surface receptor linked signaling pathway
g-protein coupled receptor protein signaling pathway
